comment: André-Pierre Gignac (French pronunciation: ​[ɑ̃dʁe pjɛʁ ʒiɲak]; born 5 December 1985) is a French professional football player who currently plays for French club Marseille in Ligue 1. He primarily plays as a striker whose influence can extend out to the wings. Gignac is described as a "powerful and dangerous" striker who is known for his "aerial presence".
name: Andre-Pierre Gignac
André-Pierre Gignac
